data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

By Sunday night, we ____ have ____ over 25 hours ____ French ____! Afterwards, we are going to catch up with a friend of his who is a director, and find out what he thought of the festival.
data.partBlankContent: The local independent movie theater is having a French film festival this week. My hus____ is a big f__ of fi__, a__ we a__ planning t_ attend ev___ night. By Sunday night, we wi__ have se__ over 25 hours o_ French fi___! Afterwards, we are going to catch up with a friend of his who is a director, and find out what he thought of the festival.
data.fullContent: The local independent movie theater is having a French film festival this week. My husband is a big fan of film, and we are planning to attend every night. By Sunday night, we will have seen over 25 hours of French films! Afterwards, we are going to catch up with a friend of his who is a director, and find out what he thought of the festival.
data.answer: 当地的独立电影院本周将举办法国电影节。我丈夫是个电影迷，我们打算每晚都去看。到星期天晚上，我们将看了超过25个小时的法国电影!之后，我们将采访他的一位导演朋友，了解他对电影节的看法。
